name: 苹果十二生肖剪纸拟我表情 Apple designed Zodiac Chinese Paper-cutting Style Memoji
description:
To celebrate 2022 Chinese New Year,

为了庆祝 2022 中国春节，


Apple is giving away red envelope covers in WeChat with specially designed Chinese paper-cutting style memoji.

苹果在微信红包封面中特别设计十二生肖剪纸风格的拟我表情。


I took screenshot and converted these to SVG and put it in Figma to share.

我截图并转换成 SVG 放在 Figma 里分享。
